Boston Superintendent stepping down

MBTA debuts double-decker cars

Three brand-new commuter rail coaches debuted today, the first of 75 double-decker cars worth $190 million that the MBTA will put into rotation this fall. (3:48 p.m.)

'Merrimack Valley bandit' captured

The FBI arrested a man they believe may be responsible for about a dozen bank robberies in the region. (1:44 p.m.)
